outfit_data.top: A cropped lavender silk blouse with oversized puff sleeves and a subtle sheen. The neckline features a daringly asymmetrical cut, dipping lower on one side for a touch of unexpected flair.
outfit_data.bottom: Wide-leg, mint green velvet trousers with a high waist and relaxed fit. The fabric drapes beautifully, creating an effortless flow that complements the airy blouse.
outfit_data.shoes: Black satin platform heels with pointed toes and a chunky heel for added height and a touch of rebellious edge.
outfit_data.extras: A pale pink cashmere cardigan draped loosely over the shoulders adds a touch of warmth and sophistication while maintaining the relaxed silhouette.
